game.name: LOST IN THE DARK LABYRINTH
game.shortDescription: Explore a colossal labyrinth built on a near world-largest scale in this maze-exploration survival FPS. Rely on a weak light and scattered braziers, collect keys, and decide when to sneak or fight as you race to escape within 60 minutes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore a colossal labyrinth built on a near world-largest scale in this maze-exploration survival FPS. Rely on a weak light and scattered braziers, collect keys, and decide when to sneak or fight as you race to escape within 60 minutes.
